thread.title: Super Bowl commercials: Check out all the best ads from Sunday
thread.title_full: Super Bowl commercials: Check out all the best ads from Sunday

title: Super Bowl commercials: Check out all the best ads from Sunday
text:
Feb 5, 2017 at 7:00p ET 0Shares 
It’s finally here: The moment you’ve been waiting for all season. The return of Super Bowl commercials. We’ll be keeping a running list of all the most notable spots from Sunday’s game right here. If you missed any or want to see them again, just check in right here. Ford: Go Further 
The automaker gives a glimpse into the future of driving, claiming that it is working on innovative ways to get you unstuck from the hindrances of life. If a car can really get my cat’s head out of a Kleenex box, I’m sold. Google: Welcome Home 
Google debuted this spot — in which a series of people come home and show off the many useful applications (who hasn’t needed a substitute for cardamom at some point in their life?) of their new Google Home device — last fall but brought it back here for the Super Bowl. Avocados from Mexico: Secret Society 
These folks gave us one of the best and weirdest Super Bowl spots last year, and they carried on in the same spirit here, showing us a meeting of a pro-avocado secret society and tossing in a random yet glorious cameo from Jon Lovitz.
